pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation and Visualization of Empirical Joint Distribution (Empirical Joint CDF) // Computes and visualizes empirical joint distribution of multivariate data with optimized algorithms and multi-thread computation. There is a faster algorithm using dynamic programming to compute the whole empirical joint distribution of a bivariate data. There are optimized algorithms for computing empirical joint CDF function values for other multivariate data. Visualization is focused on bivariate data. Levelplots and wireframes are included.
